title: Suricata - SMB (DCERPC, NTLMSSP, Kerberos)
description: - This dashboard provides information about SMB logs generated in Suricata.

definition.content:
The Suricata SMB dashboard provides a comprehensive view of Server Message Block (SMB) protocol activities within a network. 

This dashboard helps users monitor and analyze SMB traffic, identify unauthorized access, and ensure compliance with security policies.

For more information, see the [Suricata Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/suricata).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Distribution of events by Protocol Version
